# Basic spatial analysis in R

If you have finished all of the above, and want to try some GIS in R, please try the tutorial in the link below:

<https://benmarwick.github.io/How-To-Do-Archaeological-Science-Using-R/using-r-as-agis-working-with-raster-and-vector-data.html>

You can download all the data for this entire book here:

<https://github.com/benmarwick/How-To-Do-Archaeological-Science-Using-R/archive/master.zip>

If you unzip this file, you can find the files for this specific tutorial in the '06_Burke' folder. It is a good idea to create a new project for this script!
